Message:
I’m a girl, and on top
of that, I’m small.

With brothers such as mine,
’tis inevitable that I’d be
overlooked.

However, I wanted to
prove myself at all costs.

When the time came to
choose my first real blade,
I chose a great katana
without even a second thought.

For if I wielded a large weapon
that even men don’t use,
I thought I’d earn their praise.

Anything can be mastered—
even a great katana that’s
too heavy to control.

One needs just to swing it
again...and again...and again...

And after practicing the katana
countless hours each day,

I eventually became
strong enough to endure
a full day’s worth of training.

I even won my first sparring
matches against my brothers.

It looks like I indeed chose
the weapon perfect for me.

the less my father and
brothers spoke to me.

Then one day, I was ordered to
undergo a training pilgrimage in
the land across the sea.
